article:
Many years ago there was a poor man. He had _ his garden, an orange tree. On the tree there were many fine oranges.  One day he found one  _ his oranges was much bigger _ the others. It was as  _  as a football. Nobody had ever seen such a big orange. The poor man took the orange to the king . The king was so happy _ he gave the man a lot of money for it.
When a rich man heard of it, he said to himself, "It's only an orange. Why has the king given so much money _ it? I'll take my gold   cup to the king. He'll give me more money."
The next day when the king received the gold cup, he said to the rich man, "What a beautiful cup! I'll show you  something beautiful  , please take this great orange."
